title: MakeDealCRM
description: A streamlined CRM platform designed for small businesses to manage customer relationships and sales pipelines effectively.
fullDescription: MakeDealCRM is a customer relationship management system developed during Week 6 of the Gauntlet AI intensive program. It provides small businesses with an intuitive platform to track leads, manage customer interactions, and optimize their sales processes. The system features AI-powered lead scoring, automated follow-up reminders, customizable sales pipelines, and comprehensive analytics to help businesses close more deals and improve customer satisfaction.
